ropkgs
=======

```{r echo=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

`ropkgs` is an R client to discover and install rOpensci packages.

## Installation

```{r eval=FALSE}
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("sckott/ropkgs")
```

```{r}
library("ropkgs")
```

## List all packages

```{r collapse=FALSE}
out <- ro_pkgs()
out$name
out$version
out$updated
head( out$packages )
```

## Filter packages

Filter by category

```{r}
ro_pkgs(category = "history", simplify=TRUE)
```

Filter by maintainer

```{r}
ro_pkgs(maintainer = "Lincoln Mullen", simplify=TRUE)
```

## Search for packages

```{r}
ro_pkgs(query = "species", simplify = TRUE)
```

## Check if a package is on CRAN

```{r}
on_cran('taxize')
```

## Install packages

```{r}
install_ropensci(pkgs = 'musemeta')
```
